AltName.entry: ABBEYDALE ARCHERS AT DE LA SALLE

Desc.entry: The archery club is predominantly a "target archery" club, holding numerous open tournaments/competitions every year. Also holds various novelty shoots for club members only, details of which are on our website.

ContactName.entry: Mrs Carole Marshall, Beginners Course Organiser

ProvisionPlace.entry: De La Salle Sports Club (rear of Beauchief Hall)

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Meeting times vary depending on season, please contact for details
